thread.title: A wonderful week in Paris!
thread.title_full: A wonderful week in Paris! - Review of Regina Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RobinsonSoares11
title: A wonderful week in Paris!
text:
From airport arrival to departure Reception and Concierge staff afforded a five star experience for our week in Paris! The suite upgrade was phenomenal, and securing "the hard to get" restaurant reservations was nothing short of first class.
Thank you for the perfect birthday week in Paris! We will be back...
